title: Godot Engine Official
description: Godot is a 2D and 3D free and open source game engine developed by a community of contributors. It provides a huge set of common tools, so you can just focus on making your game without reinventing the wheel.

items.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.5 beta 5
items.description: Back to our regularly scheduled schedule!
items.dc:creator: Thaddeus Crews

items.title: Godot Foundation welcomes JetBrains as Platinum Sponsor
items.description: The Godot Foundation is thrilled to welcome JetBrains as a Platinum Sponsor! We’re very grateful for the support, and hope you’ll give them a warm welcome too.
items.dc:creator: Godot Foundation

items.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.5 beta 4
items.description: More critical fixes coming your way!
items.dc:creator: Thaddeus Crews

items.title: Godot OpenXR Vendors Plugin v4
items.description: What's new in the latest release of the Godot OpenXR Vendors plugin?
items.dc:creator: David Snopek

items.title: Godot Showcase - Dogwalk
items.description: Julien and Simon from Blender Studio tell us about their experience working on Dogwalk.
items.dc:creator: Emi

items.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.5 beta 3
items.description: Gotta go fast!
items.dc:creator: Thaddeus Crews

items.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.5 beta 2
items.description: The cow goes "moo"! The duck goes "quack"! The bug goes *squash*!
items.dc:creator: Thaddeus Crews

items.title: Godot Community Poll 2025
items.description: We want to learn more about the Godot community, understand who the users of the engine are, and find out how we can better support you.
items.dc:creator: Emi

items.title: Maintenance release: Godot 3.6.1
items.description: Godot 3.6 was released in September last year, and it has been mostly stable, although there have been a few more important bugs which warrant a maintenance "patch" release (3.6.x).
items.dc:creator: lawnjelly

items.title: What's New in Android & XR
items.description: Recap of the Android & XR updates during GodotCon 2025
items.dc:creator: Fredia Huya-Kouadio

items.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.5 beta 1
items.description: Godot 4.5 has entered beta and is now feature-complete!
items.dc:creator: Thaddeus Crews

items.title: A new convention to look forward to: GodotFest - Save the Date!
items.description: Introducing the second annual Godot convention: GodotFest 25 - GodotCon Europe!
items.dc:creator: GodotFest Team

items.title: Upcoming (serious) Web performance boost
items.description: Compiling the Godot Engine with WASM SIMD support truly is a game changer.
items.dc:creator: Adam Scott

items.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.5 dev 5
items.description: The cool chill of the feature freeze approaches…
items.dc:creator: Thaddeus Crews

items.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.5 dev 4
items.description: One post-GodotCon snapshot coming up!

items.title: Live from GodotCon Boston: Web .NET prototype
items.description: We managed to do the impossible: we created a Godot-based prototype for the Web that runs .NET! Come and try it!
items.dc:creator: Adam Scott

items.title: Godot Showcase - Somar
items.description: We interviewed Frédéric Plourde from Collabora and Daniel Castellanos from Decasis about the Somar project.
items.dc:creator: Bastiaan Olij

items.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.5 dev 3
items.description: Access the engine like never before!

items.description: This is where the fun begins

items.title: Godot XR update - March 2025
items.description: Godot XR Community Game Jam February 2025

items.title: Maintenance release: Godot 4.4.1
items.description: Godot 4.4 was a massive success, and with most users migrating to it, we discovered and fixed a number of significant bugs which warrant a first maintenance release.
items.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

items.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.4.1 RC 2
items.description: Closing in on the first maintenance release for Godot 4.4, fixing a number of regressions and other significant bugs found in this month's feature release.
items.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

items.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.5 dev 1
items.description: The feature freeze has melted away—here comes the flood!
items.dc:creator: Thaddeus Crews

items.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.4.1 RC 1
items.description: Godot 4.4 was released 10 days ago, and as is customary with such major feature updates, we have a late harvest of regression fixes to offer!
items.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde
